headline: Sonya Callahan Named Regional Vice President of Residential Sales and Marketing for Comcast's Heartland Region
summary: Sonya Callahan has been named regional vice president of residential sales and marketing for Comcast's Heartland Region, which includes Michigan, Indiana and Kentucky.

raw.headline: Sonya Callahan Named Regional Vice President of Residential Sales and Marketing for Comcast's Heartland Region
raw.summary: Sonya Callahan has been named regional vice president of residential sales and marketing for Comcast's Heartland Region, which includes Michigan, Indiana and Kentucky.

headline: Per Scholas Marks 30 Years of Unlocking Tech Careers, Honors Leaders from Comcast and Ballmer Group at Anniversary Gala
summary: Per Scholas, a national tech training nonprofit, today announced it will host Empowering The Future: Celebrating 30 Years of Unlocking Potential, its 30th Anniversary celebration on Tuesday, October 21 at Guastavino's in New York City. This milestone event will celebrate three decades of advancing economic mobility by providing access to high-quality, no-cost tech training to untapped talent. The gala will feature esteemed speakers and honor two key partners for their transformative impact:

headline: Shareholder Yields Are Better Than Dividend Yields. 10 Stocks That Fit the Bill.
summary: Focusing on dividends includes only one form of capital returns. Companies have other ways to put cash in shareholders’ hands, including debt paydowns and stock buybacks.

raw.headline: Shareholder Yields Are Better Than Dividend Yields. 10 Stocks That Fit the Bill.
raw.summary: Focusing on dividends includes only one form of capital returns. Companies have other ways to put cash in shareholders’ hands, including debt paydowns and stock buybacks.
